name: PowerCenter:Avoid Folder with high save log by timestamp/save log by run ratio
description: Folder should not have a ratio number of save log by timestamp/number of save log by run upper than X %.
output:
This report lists all Folders with number of save log by timestamp/save log by run upper than X %.
It provides the following information
Folder full name, ratio value
rationale: In a common PowerCenter project, different type of mapping runs in production environment. Some should be track at each run (Monthly/Weekly) and some not (Daily). Also, it is not necessary, it could be confusing and time consuming for administrators to keep all the logs of each run of the mapping on the production server. And worth, It could lead to a disk space failure.

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling
